details.title: Experimental investigation of turbulent shear flow by PIV
details.abstract: Whole field velocity measurement using particle image image velocimetry (PIV) provides an instantaneous picture of the entire flowfield. PIV is a very important method for studying turbulence and coherent vortical structures. This paper presents the results of an experimental investigation of a free jet and a plane mixing layer by using the PIV technique. Two different optical arrangements for the PIV measurements are compared.
